thread.title: DV2

author: DV2
title: DV2
text:
I am very happy with the company. You can absolutely find some great/fantastic deals. Once I found a $2k watch for $200. I even checked the price against Amazon, which had the watch listed for $2k.
Sometimes it can take a bit of time for things to arrive, though that is not most of the time.
One other thing is to make sure your read what you are agreeing to purchase, sometime the pictures taken can look and you think you are getting a ‘pair’ of the product, example speakers. Read the review, if available, they have helped me to decide to buy a larger size, such as a t-shirt because the reviewers have pointed out that, in this case, the t-shirts ran a little small.
Again really like this company and have been using them for years. Look for special sales, sometimes up to 90% off products, and just make sure you read the details of the sale and the review of products.
